targets.expr: sum(eth_rpc_errors) by (job, method)
rate(eth_rpc_request_duration_sum[1m])

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  d.deployment,
  i.name,
  d.failed,
  d.latest_ethereum_block_number,
  d.entity_count,
  d.reorg_count,
  d.current_reorg_depth,
  d.max_reorg_depth,
  d.health,
  d.synced_at
FROM subgraphs.subgraph_deployment d
JOIN info.subgraph_info i 
  ON i.subgraph = d.deployment
ORDER BY d.id DESC
LIMIT 100;

SELECT 
  e.subgraph_id,
  i.name,
  e.message,
  e.block_range,
  e.deterministic,
  e.created_at
FROM subgraphs.subgraph_error e
JOIN info.subgraph_info i ON i.subgraph = e.subgraph_id
ORDER BY e.id DESC
LIMIT 100000;

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(erpc_upstream_request_duration_seconds_bucket{network!="n/a"}[30s])) by (le, instance, network, upstream)) > 0

panels.description: Total requests received by eRPC for a specific network and method

targets.expr: sum(increase(erpc_network_request_received_total[30s])) by (instance, project, network, category)

panels.title: Network-level Requests

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.5, sum(rate(erpc_network_request_duration_seconds_bucket[30s])) by (le, instance, project, network, category))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(erpc_network_request_duration_seconds_bucket[30s])) by (le, instance, project, network, category))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(erpc_network_request_duration_seconds_bucket[5m])) by (le, instance, project, network, category))

panels.description: Total requests received by eRPC for a specific network and method

targets.expr: sum(rate(erpc_network_request_received_total[30s])) by (instance, project, network, category)

panels.title: Network-level RPS

targets.expr: sum(rate(erpc_network_request_self_rate_limited_total[30s])) by (instance, project, network, category)

panels.description: When a request fails even after trying all upstreams and retries

targets.expr: sum(increase(erpc_network_failed_request_total[30s])) by (instance,project,network,error) > 0

panels.title: Network-level Errors

panels.description: These are real requests sent to upstream endpoints, including retries

targets.expr: sum(increase(erpc_upstream_request_total[30s])) by (instance, project, network, upstream, attempt)

panels.title: Upstream-level requests

panels.description: These are real requests sent to upstream endpoints, including retries

targets.expr: sum(rate(erpc_upstream_request_total[30s])) by (instance, project, network, upstream, attempt)

panels.title: Upstream-level RPS

targets.expr: avg(erpc_upstream_score_overall{network="*"}) by (instance, project, upstream, network)

panels.description: Total requests that are sent to upstream but is rate-limited by the provider node

targets.expr: sum(increase(erpc_upstream_request_remote_rate_limited_total[30s])) by (instance, project, network, upstream)

panels.title: Upstream-level Remote rate-limited Requests

panels.description: Total requests rate-limited locally on eRPC before actually sending, based on defined budget

targets.expr: sum(increase(erpc_upstream_request_self_rate_limited_total[30s])) by (instance, project, network, upstream)

panels.title: Upstream-level self-imposed Ratel-limited requests

panels.description: Dynamically tuned value for maxCount of different rate limit budgets

targets.expr: sum by (budget, method) (erpc_rate_limiter_budget_max_count)

panels.title: Rate-limit budget MaxCount

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(erpc_upstream_request_duration_seconds_bucket[30s])) by (le, instance, project, upstream))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(erpc_upstream_request_duration_seconds_bucket[30s])) by (le, instance, project, upstream))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(erpc_upstream_request_duration_seconds_bucket[1m])) by (le, instance, project, upstream))
histogram_quantile(0.50, sum(rate(erpc_upstream_request_duration_seconds_bucket{network!="n/a"}[30s])) by (le, project, network, upstream, category))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(erpc_upstream_request_duration_seconds_bucket{network!="n/a"}[30s])) by (le, project, network, upstream, category))
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(erpc_upstream_request_duration_seconds_bucket{network!="n/a"}[1m])) by (le, project, network, upstream, category))

panels.description: The failures are more tolerable (e.g. rate limited, hedge-cancellations, etc) which doesn't mean upstream is failing, therefore less alert-worthy

targets.expr: sum(increase(erpc_upstream_request_errors_total{severity="warning"}[30s])) by (instance, project, network, upstream, error) > 0

panels.title: Upstream-level warning errors

panels.description: Failures received when attempting upstream endpoints, these errors mean upstream has failures

targets.expr: sum(increase(erpc_upstream_request_errors_total{severity="critical"}[30s])) by (instance, project, network, upstream, error) > 0

panels.title: Upstream-level critical errors
